beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Almanzo 100 breaks you. 100 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 0
beats.narration: Mile 0. The Honeymoon Phase. Rolling farmland on well-maintained gravel roads. You'll think this isn't so bad while burning matches on every roller.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel — well-maintained early, freshly laid loose stone mid-race

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 40
beats.narration: Mile 40. Reality Check Hills. The Driftless terrain shows its teeth with steeper climbs through river valleys. Your legs start asking questions you can't answer.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel — well-maintained early, freshly laid loose stone mid-race

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 65
beats.narration: Mile 65. The Stone Transition. Hard-pack gravel becomes freshly laid loose stone that saps watts like quicksand. Groups abandon the road for grass verges, searching for anything rideable.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel — well-maintained early, freshly laid loose stone mid-race

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 80
beats.narration: Mile 80. Creek Crossing Prelude. A memorable water crossing that's actually a brief respite before the nightmare that awaits ten miles ahead.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel — well-maintained early, freshly laid loose stone mid-race

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 5: Mile 90
beats.narration: Mile 90. Oriole Road Hell. Seventeen percent grades that turn this into a hike-a-bike for everyone. Even front-runners walk this wall.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel — well-maintained early, freshly laid loose stone mid-race

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 5 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).
